name: Chaos quiz
description:
Chaos Quiz is a simple puzzle game built in a state of delirium at 4am during the cold Scottish winter. With a wide variety of puzzles to confuse yourself with, an original soundtrack and the ability to add more puzzles of your own with the use of a text editor, the chaos never ends.

So, if you enjoy being stressed out by illogical answers, this game might just be for you!

Mild Disclaimer - This game is more of a prototype than a game. As such, its far from perfect. One day I may come back and remake it with all the knowledge I have now. Regardless, I hope you enjoy it in all its janky-ness
